<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopPredication::isLoopProfitableToPredicate() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/scalar/inductiverangecheckelimination-cpp/#ab2f89054e1154b0ed16bd7574a78c264">SkipProfitabilityChecks</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;std::pair&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, BasicBlock &#42;&gt;</a>, 8&gt; ExitEdges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;getExitEdges(ExitEdges);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If there is only one exiting edge in the loop, it is always profitable to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predicate the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExitEdges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#a1c479a8c434377c2b8cb056bdfdfc201">size</a>() == 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Calculate the exiting probabilities of all exiting edges from the loop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// starting with the LatchExitProbability.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Heuristic for profitability: If any of the exiting blocks&#39; probability of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exiting the loop is larger than exiting through the latch block, it&#39;s not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profitable to predicate the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LatchBlock = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;getLoopLatch();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LatchBlock &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Should have a single latch at this point!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LatchTerm = LatchBlock-&gt;getTerminator();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LatchTerm-&gt;getNumSuccessors() == 2 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;expected to be an exiting block with 2 succs!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LatchBrExitIdx =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LatchTerm-&gt;getSuccessor(0) == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;getHeader() ? 1 : 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We compute branch probabilities without BPI. We do not rely on BPI since</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Loop predication is usually run in an LPM and BPI is only preserved</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// lossily within loop pass managers, while BPI has an inherent notion of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// being complete for an entire function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the latch exits into a deoptimize or an unreachable block, do not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// predicate on that latch check.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;LatchExitBlock = LatchTerm-&gt;getSuccessor(LatchBrExitIdx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;UnreachableInst&gt;</a>(LatchTerm) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LatchExitBlock-&gt;getTerminatingDeoptimizeCall())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Latch terminator has no valid profile data, so nothing to check</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profitability on.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a763fc760b3f95cdd3389fdb004122381">hasValidBranchWeightMD</a>(&#42;LatchTerm))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ComputeBranchProbability =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#91;&amp;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitingBlock,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitBlock) -&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kbeads/#abf9ad6053d17fcef3b68af71aa681944a27d0e059322508a76f918503800ef1bd">Term</a> = ExitingBlock-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#aef9e9fcf4c5dfce90276ca16d91b8e46">getTerminator</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumSucc = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kbeads/#abf9ad6053d17fcef3b68af71aa681944a27d0e059322508a76f918503800ef1bd">Term</a>-&gt;getNumSuccessors();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mdnode">MDNode</a> &#42;ProfileData = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a6da87e96231847cc11de9fd5d5020d40">getValidBranchWeightMDNode</a>(&#42;Term)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a> Weights;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac19cbbc4935a23e1d44f65e1eaba6b1d">extractBranchWeights</a>(ProfileData, Weights);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><span class="doxyHighlight">      uint64&#95;t Numerator = 0, Denominator = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;i, Weight&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a206e2134ddd2312c3488d0632d98f554">llvm::enumerate</a>(Weights)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68kbeads/#abf9ad6053d17fcef3b68af71aa681944a27d0e059322508a76f918503800ef1bd">Term</a>-&gt;getSuccessor(i) == ExitBlock)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Numerator += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Denominator += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp-/#aede9c090bfa516420939d4240fad8248">Weight</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If all weights are zero act as if there was no profile data</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Denominator == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(1, NumSucc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(Numerator, Denominator);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LatchBlock != ExitingBlock &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlight">             </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Latch term should always have profile data!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No profile data, so we choose the weight as 1/num&#95;of&#95;succ(Src)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#a0333345669e75a54c7de3d5fe0f6e746">BranchProbability::getBranchProbability</a>(1, NumSucc);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> LatchExitProbability =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ComputeBranchProbability(LatchBlock, LatchExitBlock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Protect against degenerate inputs provided by the user. Providing a value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// less than one, can invert the definition of profitable loop predication.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">float</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ScaleFactor = <a href="#a2ca9d1eca702301022d91b79c39b14a7">LatchExitProbabilityScale</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ScaleFactor &lt; 1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Ignored user setting for loop-predication-latch-probability-scale: &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &lt;&lt; <a href="#a2ca9d1eca702301022d91b79c39b14a7">LatchExitProbabilityScale</a> &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;The value is set to 1.0\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ScaleFactor = 1.0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LatchProbabilityThreshold = LatchExitProbability &#42; ScaleFactor;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;ExitEdge : ExitEdges) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> ExitingBlockProbability =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ComputeBranchProbability(ExitEdge.first, ExitEdge.second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Some exiting edge has higher probability than the latch exiting edge.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No longer profitable to predicate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExitingBlockProbability &gt; LatchProbabilityThreshold)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We have concluded that the most probable way to exit from the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop is through the latch (or there&#39;s no profile information and all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exits are equally likely).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// If we can (cheaply) find a widenable branch which controls entry into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop, return it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973" lineLink="#ad459fdaea6898de5c02c8ed651ae50c9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst">BranchInst</a> &#42;<a href="#ad459fdaea6898de5c02c8ed651ae50c9">FindWidenableTerminatorAboveLoop</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loopinfo">LoopInfo</a> &amp;LI) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Walk back through any unconditional executed blocks and see if we can find</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a widenable condition which seems to control execution of this loop.  Note</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that we predict that maythrow calls are likely untaken and thus that it&#39;s</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profitable to widen a branch before a maythrow call with a condition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// afterwards even though that may cause the slow path to run in a case where</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it wouldn&#39;t have otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;BB = L-&gt;getLoopPreheader();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!BB)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a59fb91d1691350f7d1b8e8a114e3f2a4">getSinglePredecessor</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BB == Pred-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a79c007dcf9fff57e1569e778d7885b5e">getSingleSuccessor</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">        BB = Pred;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred = BB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a59fb91d1691350f7d1b8e8a114e3f2a4">getSinglePredecessor</a>()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;BranchInst&gt;</a>(Pred-&gt;getTerminator()))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(0) == BB &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9d7f27a51d40f21ec17a854a6a5d5d4f">isWidenableBranch</a>(BI))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BI;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Return the minimum of all analyzeable exit counts.  This is an upper bound</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// on the actual exit count.  If there are not at least two analyzeable exits,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// returns SCEVCouldNotCompute.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003" lineLink="#a56378412b516c96bbab7cd31b530e0ff"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;<a href="#a56378412b516c96bbab7cd31b530e0ff">getMinAnalyzeableBackedgeTakenCount</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution">ScalarEvolution</a> &amp;SE,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dominatortree">DominatorTree</a> &amp;DT,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                       <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 16&gt;</a> ExitingBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><span class="doxyHighlight">  L-&gt;getExitingBlocks(ExitingBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;const SCEV &#42;, 4&gt;</a> ExitCounts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitingBB : ExitingBlocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;ExitCount = SE.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalarevolution/#ab24add5df0874cdfa47b47b1d9926e9e">getExitCount</a>(L, ExitingBB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;SCEVCouldNotCompute&gt;</a>(ExitCount))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1022"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1024"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This implements an analogous, but entirely distinct transform from the main</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1025"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// loop predication transform.  This one is phrased in terms of using a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1026"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// widenable branch &#42;outside&#42; the loop to allow us to simplify loop exits in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1027"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// following loop.  This is close in spirit to the IndVarSimplify transform</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1028"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of the same name, but is materially different widening loosens legality</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1029"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sharply.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1030"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LoopPredication::predicateLoopExits(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scevexpander">SCEVExpander</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/virtregmap-cpp/#a1ad52109a2ff430460c8776286b97b2e">Rewriter</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1031"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The transformation performed here aims to widen a widenable condition</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// above the loop such that all analyzeable exit leading to deopt are dead.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It assumes that the latch is the dominant exit for profitability and that</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// exits branching to deoptimizing blocks are rarely taken. It relies on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// semantics of widenable expressions for legality. (i.e. being able to fall</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// down the widenable path spuriously allows us to ignore exit order,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// unanalyzeable exits, side effects, exceptional exits, and other challenges</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which restrict the applicability of the non-WC based version of this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transform in IndVarSimplify.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NOTE ON POISON/UNDEF - We&#39;re hoisting an expression above guards which may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// imply flags on the expression being hoisted and inserting new uses (flags</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are only correct for current uses).  The result is that we may be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserting a branch on the value which can be either poison or undef.  In</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1045"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this case, the branch can legally go either way; we just need to avoid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// introducing UB.  This is achieved through the use of the freeze</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, 16&gt;</a> ExitingBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;getExitingBlocks(ExitingBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExitingBlocks.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1053"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Nothing to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1054"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1055"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Latch = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;getLoopLatch();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Latch)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;WidenableBR = <a href="#ad459fdaea6898de5c02c8ed651ae50c9">FindWidenableTerminatorAboveLoop</a>(L, &#42;LI);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!WidenableBR)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scev">SCEV</a> &#42;LatchEC = SE-&gt;getExitCount(L, Latch);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;SCEVCouldNotCompute&gt;</a>(LatchEC))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profitability - want hot exit in analyzeable set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// At this point, we have found an analyzeable latch, and a widenable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// condition above the loop.  If we have a widenable exit within the loop</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (for which we can&#39;t compute exit counts), drop the ability to further</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// widen so that we gain ability to analyze it&#39;s exit count and perform this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// transform.  TODO: It&#39;d be nice to know for sure the exit became</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// analyzeable after dropping widenability.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ChangedLoop = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The use of umin(all analyzeable exits) instead of latch is subtle, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// important for profitability.  We may have a loop which hasn&#39;t been fully</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// canonicalized just yet.  If the exit we chose to widen is provably never</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// taken, we want the widened form to &#42;also&#42; be provably never taken.  We</span></CodeLine>
